website_summaries.verdict: For DIY folks who need a  power-tool upgrade, it offers professional-grade quality with impressive torque and long-lasting battery life.
pros: Most users are repeat customers, citing long-lasting battery, reliability, power
Batteries last through complex jobs and over multiple days
cons: Chuck sometimes jams or becomes otherwise inoperable, requiring warranty repair
Multiple reports of wobble in the chuck

customer_reviews.title: Switching from Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched everything from Dewalt to Milwaukee. Even though it is more expensive by about 25%. However instead of going through 8 batteries a day with Dewalt we are only using 1 and a half on a full charge. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great drill sets love them i switched from ryobi to ...
customer_reviews.text: great drill sets love them i switched from ryobi to this amd i love it great set great price and ill be honest even the dewalt guys ask to borrow when there drill comes up shirt i work fire alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty amazing. I haven't even used the driver much ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most torque you can get in a cordless drill, it's pretty amazing. I haven't even used the driver much yet, but the drill is pretty amazing. User-friendly controls, too. I'm a convert from Makita and Dewalt power tools, and I'll buy more M18 stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, hammer mode is not.
customer_reviews.text: With hurricane dorian on it's way I decided to put plywood over the windows of my house. Going through concrete and using tapcons I set the drill to the hammer mode. Worked great until I was finished. The drill was very hot and the bit was stuck. It took a vise and pliers with a cloth to remove the masonry bit. To my disappointment the drill now has a grinding noise and the chuck has a difficult time opening and closing. I am pretty upset. An update after I get ahold of milwaukee.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: 2897-22 vs 2997-22
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong product. If you haven't noticed, the 2997-22 is selling for less than the previous model. This is due to the manufacturer thinking that a smaller set with more power would be better, when in reality it is a overheating mess. The drill now generates more heat, with less material/air flow to cool it. Make certain you are getting the set that you ask for, as I was shipped a 2997-22 as the seller stated "since they are the smaller, stronger, and better tools", good on him checking specs, but the reviews on Milwaukee's own website spell out the disdain most customers have for this "upgrade."
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work to drill 2 1/2 " holes in brick and concrete walls. I had been using a large corded hammer drill when a coworker told me he always left that in the van in favor of the cordless Milwaukee. All I can say is I wish he had told me sooner! I was literally shocked at how easily this thing goes through concrete. I've done 7 installs and only needed to charge the battery once!
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: died with light use
customer_reviews.text: The drill set appeared to operate well- long lasting batteries, plenty of torque. I use it almost daily for installing drywall, light carpentry, decking repairs as is my trade. Shortly after using the impact drill machine oil began to leak out of the tip. Now, about 2 years light use of the drill, the gears have stripped out rendering it useless. Previously had a Craftsman for about half the price that held on nearly a decade. It was a lot more money for the Milwaukee but it had great reviews online and I could afford a more expensive set, so a made the purchase. Very disappointed. Can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William W

customer_reviews.title: Impressive tool
customer_reviews.text: 2/1//2017: Chuck jams after a 5 minutes use. Rubber in handle is sticky as if it was very old or exposed to UV rays. Am I the unluckiest one? It was an international purchase and return it would cost me almost half the price of the item. Seller only covers shipping at USA. 21/9/2019: Impressive tool, I love it. When new, I was disapointed, but once I unjam chuck and cleaned rubber handle I fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar S.

customer_reviews.title: One word...tough!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in August 2018. I just charged the battery for the first time 8 months later and it was by choice as it was still running. I have built many pieces of furniture and drilled through various items. One piece has well over 300 screws. This is second to none. Milwaukee is built tough abs made for the most rigorous applications. These are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Do youself a Favor - justify the price and buy it.
customer_reviews.text: These things are fantastic. I have been using them for project around the house. Driven thousands of screws, on one charge with the impact. Drill hasn't needed recharge yet, and using hammer drill for concrete anchors. These items are definitely better than any lower end drill that i have previously used.
customer_reviews.author: mkjprice

customer_reviews.title: They do great but the drill chuck is easier to shell out ...
customer_reviews.text: Use millwakee fuels at work in a professional industrial setting. They do great but the drill chuck is easier to shell out than I'd like. Happened at home drilling 1/4 concrete holes. Happens at work to reamers in steel
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: At Last a Quality Rechargeable Power Drill
customer_reviews.text: I never had much luck with rechargeable battery drills that is until I bought the Milwaukee. The power of these drills is comparable to an electric drill and the battery life is exceptional. In the past I found battery drills to weak and the hammer action pretty poor. Not with the Milwaukee, this drill is pure power, a drill on steroids. If you want a battery drill for serious work then this is the drill for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband. He says it's awesome. He wishes he would have settled on it sooner, that there are several projects that would have been easier if he'd of had this then. I think it's a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen FitzGerald

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of machines. This is my first impact driver. boy does that save a lot of pain and suffering. It's a great tool. The drill is a beast. Super powerful. I've been drilling holes through concrete. The batteries have a long life too. Really great set!
customer_reviews.author: B. Warrick

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tool of 2017
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2017 and never looked back. I am very satisfied with the build quality and overall product. This set is bit expensive when not on sale. I would buy dewalt however the price was the same when I bought this set.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great prices and Milwaukee reliability.  Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it through the paces yet but ordering from Builders World Wholesale was a lot cheaper than anywhere else. Batteries charged up quickly and provide more than enough power for the small tasks I've used them. Ill give a full report after I finish my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: NotSomeRando

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee makes the best power tools
customer_reviews.text: Over a year old and still running well, has definitely been through a beating since my husband uses these on a daily basis(he’s an electrician).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Great warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work, Great quality and Great warranty. The impact took a crap about 4 months after purchase while in use at work. I sent it to the manufacture for free and they fixed it and sent it back, Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Its weird when you buy expensive tools and chuck is ...
customer_reviews.text: Its weird when you buy expensive tools and chuck is of center, waving and all the drill is shaking when you are trying to screw something or drill. Going to return and go true the stores, so can check right there
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product, arrived two days early and in great ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, arrived two days early and in great shape. Shipping box was very good no dent or cut . Drill set was great in new box . Definitely will look for Demo for any future purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best. Great. Phenomenal. Worth the money if you use a drill and impact often. Worth every single penny. They pay for themselves with their durability and power. Battery lasts forever and charging is rapid. Way better than my dewalt
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee has always been the toughest brand for me. This drill and driver have served many tough hours. I.E. falling off the top of ladders etc. The drill about ripped my arm off(with the handle!) as I was using a 4 inch hole saw several times in a row. I haven't met a screw that the driver can't rattle in. Different speeds on the driver come in handy every day. The 5.0 batteries are also a real bonus, allowing me to run a long time without changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: 38955modeldude

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome drivers.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Maybe just a bad bit set, only issue I have had is with a couple of the shockwave bits. The 1/2" socket adapter snapped in half, and didn't seat in the 1/4" impact driver properly. I didn't have to pull ring out to remove that bit a a couple others. Have to use an extension piece to get full seating. Not problem with drivers I don't think, but a few misshapen bits.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Uhmmm. This was a score. Same exact set ...
customer_reviews.text: Uhmmm. This was a score. Same exact set was alot of $$ at Home Depot. I paid $225 for this. YES!! This Milwuakee Fuels are unbeatable. Wont mess around with Dewalt, Ridgid, or any other brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Money

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS DRILL/DRIVER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS DRILL/DRIVER! i use them everyday and they have never failed me. tons of power and the batteries last all day and sometimes two. the case is durable and so are the drill and driver. they are very comfortable in your hand and at the time of purchase they had the best warranty out there; 5 years on the tool and either 2 or 3 on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Diggler

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome! My old drill didn't have anywhere near the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set daily for about three weeks, it's awesome! My old drill didn't have anywhere near the power this set offers. The batteries are great, I've only charged one of them in two weeks. And the Case! You can leave your bit and battery on both tools, no disassembly required, it's a big case, but I'd rather have that than have to constantly take apart batteries and bits.
customer_reviews.author: mh1078

customer_reviews.title: Chuck jams after a 5 minutes use. Rubber in ...
customer_reviews.text: Chuck jams after a 5 minutes use. Rubber in handle is sticky as if it was very old or exposed to UV rays. Am I the unluckiest one? It was an international purchase and return it would cost me almost half the price of the item. Seller only covers shipping at USA.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tools
customer_reviews.text: Love mine, this was the cheapest I could find them, and they work great. I have had them for 3 years and I wouldn't buy any other brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Torques better then anything I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've used dewalt and makita by far best honest combo battery life is a huge plus case I'd rather have a bag but I'm a laborer so for home use it would be perfect but I'm not at all disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Top notch drills!
customer_reviews.text: These drills blow away the competition hands down. If you want the best money can buy, buy Milwaukee fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead79

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I do light fabrication at work and need good drill for drilling through steel. This drill has proven itself in the few days I’ve had it. Also the impact driver is very stout. I have used it for nuts and bolts and also running self tappers. The self tapper mode is okay but i prefer to run them down on 3 and know when to let off the throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Unf.
customer_reviews.text: It's a hot red sex-machine. You know you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this set first, I tried them out and as expected there awesome tools.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power tools!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using the professional Bosch set before this one and let me tell you, The Milwaukee is a totally different story. amazing power, great built and excellent quality. Also, the battery never ends...keeps on going
customer_reviews.author: G. G Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few months now, and I love them, definitely beats my dewalt impact driver and drill, and they are definitely powerful to get the job done on almost everything. Battery life also lasts a long time i barely see myself having ti change them out as i used to
customer_reviews.author: Jomar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I chose this set for the hammer drill which is handy for non-concrete jobs. You may want to pry on the bit holders to tighten them. Otherwise they drop the bits. Small grievance but it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it is rock solid and exceeded my expectations. I did try and remove lug nuts from my Ford F-150 torqued at 103lbs, just it was ease.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as described. These are powerful tools! I have used other brands (Dewalt, Makita, Panasonic, Porter Cable) in the past and the M18 Fuel series outperforms them all.
customer_reviews.author: JSimmons

customer_reviews.title: Durable/Power
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Milwaukee tools daily for the last 13 years. The new brushless are unbelievable. Once you've tried the new brushless you'll never go back to the older versions.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Best condo set on the market
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced both of my Festool the impact driver and drill with this Milwaukee combo they have more power better battery life and drill has hammer drill which is a very big help to me and my business GREAT JOB MILWAUKEE
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesom product, I love this hammer drill impact driver combo. Works wonderfully. Would recommend a carrier belt if you use it all around the work site or your home.
customer_reviews.author: Héctor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good investment
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this combo set. It pays to buy a good quality set of drills. Very reliable and dependable. The battery last long and nice to have indicator on battery level. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kuanny

customer_reviews.title: Works great and was as described by seller
customer_reviews.text: It's Milwaukee. Works great and was as described by seller. No problems at all. Great addition for any construction worker. I'm a commercial/ industrial / utility solar electrician so these tools get worked out. Holding up great
customer_reviews.author: BIGD

customer_reviews.title: Class of its own
customer_reviews.text: This thing runs forever on a charge and can break your arm with its torque. Don’t waste your money and time with other units.

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and power.
customer_reviews.text: I was in the fence with this one and another brand. I went with this ad am very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE DRILL FOR ANYONE WHO WANTS THE BEST IN ITS CLASS.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best cordless i have ever used. bought it to power my ice auger and it works great

customer_reviews.title: I’m always satisfied with Milwaukee tools
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about milwaukee tools, I use them for my renovation jobs and they have never failed me yet

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set and top quality tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set and top quality tools. They are used daily in construction work and I would recommend them to others in a heartbeat.

customer_reviews.title: Drills
customer_reviews.text: If you get a older model impact it’s on recall take to milkawwe they will swap out free of charge

customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal For such a perfect power tool pack!! Works great, came as described & excited to use them regularly!!!

customer_reviews.title: Tools that last

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had Milwaukee tools forever and this is the best set of drills they have put out so far. Very strong and I put them through a lot on a daily basis.

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee Is Tops
customer_reviews.text: This set is the best set I have ever owned. The power and torque of the drill and impact wrench are second to none. Price was unbeatable for such a top of the line tool. Batteries last longer than any drill I have owned. Very reputable company. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Hockeylady

customer_reviews.title: best combo available
customer_reviews.text: i love Milwaukee tools the m18 fuel is the best this was an upgrade to a previous combo kit i had and i'm so glad i went brushless these things will last longer than me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 5 years ago or so, used almost every day (tradesman) still going strong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool set, puts other brands to shame. Battery life is incredible. I used it nearly everyday on the job as a Journeyman carpenter, that is until it was stolen. Wth? Steal a 'working man's tools'?; makes me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and uses them every day for work
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: amazing . using them almost every day with electrical work these batteries last a long time and drills got power i haven't found in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Franky17

customer_reviews.title: Best price around for this kit/package combo
customer_reviews.text: Best price around for this kit/package combo. I use the drill to power my ice auger. Love it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Nhia Vang

customer_reviews.title: I would reorder is I needed another set and I would recommend both the product and the vendor to friends and ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and early. Product works very well. I would reorder is I needed another set and I would recommend both the product and the vendor to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: These Milwaukee tools are great. My husband loves them and tells everyone how ...
customer_reviews.text: These Milwaukee tools are great. My husband loves them and tells everyone how much!! Only problem with this order is ... received kit today and see it is now $10.00 cheaper. Hmmmm..do I get a refund?
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: ... had tested this set when using a friends and loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: Hubby had tested this set when using a friends and loved it so much, I bought him one. The old tools are being passed on. This built a dock very nicely including big lag screws. The battery power was really long lasting and tool very rugged and hard working.
customer_reviews.author: L. Horricks

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, should have bought them years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great tools, should have bought them years ago. The fuel series is relatively new and are very nice to use. Small size and high torque. I used the impact driver to remove wheel lug nuts. (do tighten them with a torque wrench) There is something about using a high quality tool that makes the task more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but love
customer_reviews.text: Don't really have much to impart. The product speaks for itself. Milwaukee is now my brand of choice for power tools. I also picked up a nice little compressor/tire pump from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best drill and impact on the market right now. I’ve used every brand of drills out there and nothing competes with the m18 fuel. I highly recommend to anyone in the market for a drill and impact set!
customer_reviews.author: aakolinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A tad heavy, but very, very powerful with an incredibly long lasting battery.

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older 12v bosch set. The driver, aside from the battery, is actually smaller and shorter than my old bosch, while being far more powerful.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power from the 1/4" impact driver. Love these tools.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Milwaukee, but check model no.(These are great tools).

customer_reviews.text: Great set, case is great to store tools while not in use to prolong life. Batteries last a long time and charge quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- fast shipment and Great price

customer_reviews.text: He says it is excellent. It holds the charge and runs longer than any other tool on the work site. Very good.

customer_reviews.text: Runs strong all day on one charge. Quality kit, used all day for days and no problems!

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power and long lasting batteries. Drove in deck screws all day and was still showing 3 out of four lights on the battery. I've used Ridgid, Bosch and Makita in the past, and IMHO the Milwaukee Fuel series is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Birnel

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with them and recommend them to anyone who is ...
customer_reviews.text: We're renovating due to severe water damage. The Rigid tools wore out and we ordered these to replace them. We are very happy with them and recommend them to anyone who is going to be doing any construction around their house or barn.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee drills live up to the reputation.
customer_reviews.text: I am a DIY type of guy. Not a pro here. I have my own house and I have learned that most small drills are good enough for small projects. Still there are those projects where you need the extra strength that these drills provide. These babies are clearly more than what I need, but its nice to know that if I have future projects I don't have to worry if they will get the job done. They charge fairly fast. They are not heavy. Love the feature that torques but doesn't break the screw heads. Super happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: tony324

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: New, excellent, even charged and ready to use. Very nice. Thx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and shipping was fast! Definitely recommend this product and company!

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding is probably the one word I can use to ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding is probably the one word I can use to describe this product. I only review 5 star products and 1 star products. This one is a 5.

customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this product. They work great, clearly very high quality

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 2897-22 M18 Fuel 2-Tool Combo Kit, Red
product_meta.description: Style:2897-22The 2897-22 M18 FUEL 2-Tool Combo Kit is the highest performing Hammer Drill & Impact Driver Combo Kit on the market. Included is the M18 FUEL Hammer Drill (2704-20), the Most Powerful 18-volt cordless drill on the market. Delivering up to 1,200 in-lbs of torque and up to 2,000 RPM, it provides faster drilling speed under heavy load to increase productivity. Also included is the M18 FUEL 1/4 inch Hex Impact Driver (2753-20), the Most Powerful Impact Driver in its class. At 1800 in-lbs of fastening torque, this impact drives screws faster but also provides greater control over power and speed thanks to its proprietary 4-mode DRIVE CONTROL. M18 FUEL features the most advanced cordless technology available; a POWERSTATE Brushless Motor, REDLINK PLUS Electronic Intelligence and REDLITHIUM Battery Technology, resulting in longer motor life, more run time and more power. WHAT'S INCLUDED (1) M18 FUEL 1/2inch Hammer Drill/Driver (Bare Tool) (2704-20) (1) M18 FUEL 1/4inch Hex Impact Driver (Bare Tool) (2753-20) (2) M18 REDLITHIUM XC5.0 Extended Capacity Battery Pack (48-11-1850) (1) M18 & M12 Multi-Voltage Charger (48-59-1812) (2) Belt Clip (2) Bit Holder (1) Side Handle (1) Carrying Case
feature_bullets: Hammer drill/driver's POWERSTATE Brushless Motor delivers 1200 in. lbs. of peak torque and up to 2000 RPM for faster drilling speeds.
Impact driver's POWERSTATE Brushless Motor delivers 1800 in. lbs. of fastening torque for faster driving speeds.
REDLITHIUM XC 5.0Ah batteries provide powerful performance.
REDLITHIUM battery technology offers superior pack construction, electronics and performance to deliver exceptional work per charge and work over pack life.

Includes 2704-20 1/2 in. hammer drill, 2753-20 1/4 in. hex impact driver, two (2) REDLITHIUM XC 5.0 batteries, M12-M18 multi-voltage charger, (2) belt clips, (2) bit holders, side handle and carrying case.

specifications.Included Components: Combo Packs, Power Tool Combo Packs, Pneumatics
